website_summaries.verdict: A next generation of animals for kids who already love the Little Live Pets, but not an attempt at a realistic looking animal like the others.
pros: The unicorn can move and dance
Horn lights up and changes colors
Made for the child who loves unicorns
cons: Not very large, and may seem a little less exciting than some of the other Little Live Pets

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little thing. It does seem a little overly done on the commercials. It’s just ok.. after a few hours, it ended up tossed in the toy box with the hatchimals.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Barr TwoFlowers772

customer_reviews.title: Sweet, colorful unicorn
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for upcoming Christmas for my 7 year old niece who is crazy about unicorns. The unicorn’s movements are very cute, it actually purrs and nuzzles when you rub it’s neck. The horn lights up, plays music and the unicorn “dances”. It seems sturdy enough to hold up to a 7 year old. I’m quite sure my niece will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but be ready to replace batteries
customer_reviews.text: First be aware that your new toy might need new batteries. My daughter was worried it was broken because it would not turn on but it just needed new batteries. It’s a very cute toy with lots of interaction but it’s unfortunate it does not walk. The cupcake for it is adorable but way too small and easily lost.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M.

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn Magic
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 3 year old daughters adore these super cute unicorns. They have had them a while now and still play with them. This is a big deal with toddlers. It is really easy to discard a toy after a few plays. The hair does tangle easily.
customer_reviews.author: Desi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her unicorn! Adorable and seems very sturdy (I have a 21 month old who constantly tries to get ahold of it). I would definitely recommend this unicorn! I’ve never had a problem with any of the little live pets I’ve bought and I believe this one will hold up as well as the others we have.
customer_reviews.author: C&B_1208

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, durable, fun
customer_reviews.text: So durable , colorful, walks in place, pretends to eat, 6 year old likes it. Small
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Fun but kinda useless
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for Christmas and we thought she would absolutely love it - she's obsessed with unicorns - but it doesn't really do anything. It's super cute and she uses it to play with her dolls and other toys, but she doesn't use it for its intended purpose. Which is a little disappointing considering the cost. It's very aesthetically pleasing, though!
customer_reviews.author: R. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for an electronic unicorn
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter wanted "a remote control unicorn" for her 3rd birthday and i'm delighted to say that good old Sparkles here was a most acceptable alternative! (If anyone finds a remote control unicorn please let me know?!). This little unicorn reacts to being stroked, having a cupcake put in front of her mouth, and being ignored for a short amount of time. Perfect for a little girl who wants every toy to be a pet of some sort! I highly recommend this toy - it's really good value for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Hart

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly cute
customer_reviews.text: On a weak moment I allowed my granddaughter to go online and pick out a gift. One look at Sparkles and all other toys were banished to the delete pile. She could hardly wait for Sparkles to arrive which leads to the question of WHY does it take even a prime package 4 days to get here. That aside, one it arrived, Sparkles was embraced and loved. Personally I think the pony should move a little more but my granddaughter is happy and loves combing its mane. So I recommend it based on her joyful embrace.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Liked by my grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old grand daughter, who is into unicorns. Her mom tells me she likes it and plays with it but her 2 year old brother likes it even more. They are subtle moves the unicorn makes which are described in the directions. It would take at least a 5 year old to have the patience to perform them but apparently it has enough entertainment value without them.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Package removal ruins hair
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied. You should never package an item in a way that ruins it when opened. The plastic is sewn to the hair and doesn't have another side to split opened so the hair is all matted and ruined and already falling out. My child opened this as a Christmas gift and is attached to it so I can't physically return for a refund since a new one would be packaged the same way. I would not have ordered if I had know. Wishing I could be refunded for this item. Unfortunately, we ordered one for two of our children in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hannon

customer_reviews.title: CUTE but Lacks Excitement and/Or Interactivity
customer_reviews.text: Was not impressed with this Lil Live Pet! My Granddaughter likes collecting these and has enjoyed playing with them. However, this Unicorn “SPARKLES” was quite the disappointment at Christmas. Very “lame”! Does not have much movements or sounds, and not very durable. She thought it was “cute” but currently it’s just sitting on a shelf collecting dust! I rarely write a review if it’s not an overall 3+Star but I felt I should be honest about how disappointed my 9yr old was with this item. Unfortunately I cannot recommend ordering this item based on her dissatisfaction and disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: NANA2-4-GIRLS

customer_reviews.title: ... little expensive for the size of the toy but perfect!
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive for the size of the toy but perfect !
customer_reviews.author: NONNA RIA

customer_reviews.title: Broken and unsafe
customer_reviews.text: Corroded out and does not work. Her only present from santa /: now I have to waste my time and do an amazon return
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift 💗🦄💗🦄💗
customer_reviews.text: These are a Christma Gift for my Granddaughters 💗💗 I KNOW they will Love & Enjoy them. They light up and prance around, vibrant color 🦄. Absolutely ADORABLE! Im very happy with my purchase and even happier I bought one of each color. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Birthday Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My God daughter received this as a birthday gift. She played all day with it. During her party the boys were playing with it as well. Had to hide it as the boys are rougher and didn't want it broken! Soon as the party ended my God daughter played with it all night.
customer_reviews.author: Jode

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart the day we got it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter. She loves it. Sadly it fell apart the day we got it. My husband was able to put it back together. Wouldn't buy again because it isn't made well.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grand daughter for Christmas and she loves it, So cute, dances and very well made for the price. Very pleased with my purchase and put a smile on my grand daughters face ... Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hall

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: gave to granddaughter for her 5th birthday...she loves it.....unicorn really lights up and dances......put a smile on childs face....would reccommend
customer_reviews.author: CAROL

customer_reviews.title: My child disapproves
customer_reviews.text: My child didn't like enough to play more than once with it. Actually I find it kind of ugly and not interactive enough to be interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: My girl handpicked this toy and she couldn’t be happier with it. Not sure how long it’ll last but it’s already worth it, especially for that price
customer_reviews.author: Nadav Noy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute gift for a young Little girl
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter loved this gift today on her birthday. She said that they love each other and they are best friends now. It was very cute
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Made my daughter very happy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought my daughter. She got one last year for her birthday and loved it. She lost and and was so upset! The make a newer version at the store and didnt have this version. I was so excited to see amazon had it because she wanted the same one she had before. It is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon kimes

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with a pet unicorn
customer_reviews.text: This was cute- smaller than I expected for the price. Bought it as a gift but it didn’t make it to the child bc my 4 year old was not letting it out of her sight. But it was one of those toys that lost its glimmer pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this toy. We had to buy this same toy for several of her friends. It works great and I find it simply adorable. You’ll be happy with this purchase. The toy works well.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Majestic!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute toy. The horn lights up so brightly and the unicorn dance is adorable. My niece loves it. I would definitely recommend it for any child who likes majestic unicorns!
customer_reviews.author: EmilyRae

customer_reviews.title: Moves around quite a bit.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter, age 6, loved this gift. She played with the unicorn for the rest of the day. The unicorn moves quite a bit and the music is cute. Seems sturdy and I consider it a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought, but as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is true to the description, but it looks small and sounds LOUD. I deducted one star for the level of obnoxious noise, but it is as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Moto

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter wanted a talking unicorn for christmas and this was as close as we could get. It was pretty, sturdy, and can talk and walk. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Rennie D

customer_reviews.title: Animated horse
customer_reviews.text: Great little horse. Moves very well and grandkids loved adding it to their stable. Good quality and size. Seems to be pretty durable even with toddlers
customer_reviews.author: linda g

customer_reviews.title: Still My Daughter’s Fave
customer_reviews.text: This was the big hit of my daughters tenth birthday! Very cute, and she checks it every day and likes to just sit with it and listen to the music. She’s got Down syndrome so we often buy toys and such for younger kids. She just loves Sparkle!
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is adorable and it's responses to it's props or the slightest touch make it seem like it has a mind of it's own. My four-year-old loves it and it has held up well to constant use and being banged around in her backpack.
customer_reviews.author: S. Albritton

customer_reviews.title: Fun interactive pet
customer_reviews.text: While my daughter didn't play with this a lot, she played with it more than most of her other Christmas toys. It's a little less mobile and responsive than it appears in videos.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pilliard

customer_reviews.title: A Fantasy Come True.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandaughter. She loved it! Bright. Colorful. I must say, it was smaller than I thought it would be, but that probably my fault for not reading the details close enough. Ut it is a beloved toy!!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvester.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good gift
customer_reviews.text: It's very cheaply packed and the pony material is to hard. Too cheap looking for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: T-Rex Mama

customer_reviews.title: Daughters new favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter absolutely LOVES her unicorn. She literally carries it everywhere. It nodes its head and kicks its feet on its own. She is always playing with it and it even comes with its own little brush to brush its hair.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Good size for little kids. Super cute
customer_reviews.text: My 3 years old daughter love it, its sturdy enough for her to play without much concern, it walks short steps it lights up and sounds. A little smaller than expected but a great size for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: MGG

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my niece!!!
customer_reviews.text: She LOVED it! This was SO cute! She actually got another one from my parents & she loved them both so much she kept them both (they were different colors). really great gift - especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Schenk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very great quality, functionality was great. Wasn’t over bearing with the noise. 4 year old loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Delissa Coureton

customer_reviews.title: lovable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for gift for oldest grand daughter and she really enjoys it and lights up as well
customer_reviews.author: dorey mcitnyre

customer_reviews.title: Happy grandbaby!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this immediately. It is cute and made fairly well. Makes her smile, so I smile.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Kinda boring, doesn’t work for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: It’s kinda boring nothing too interesting I paid around Christmas time so prices were jacked. Probably worth the price now.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this so much. She had seen the commercials asnd would not stop talking about it. Amazon had it here in plenty of time. She loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Vallejo

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 3 year old granddaughter.
customer_reviews.text: She loved it. It didn't survive but about a week, because of rough treatment by an older sibling. Grandpa mended it and it is almost as good as new. Big brother is not allowed to play with it...
customer_reviews.author: Erica E. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Makes cute noises and lights up plus moves. Then takes a break and scares you half to death 10 minutes later when it neighs really loud. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Joli

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured durable holding up well!
customer_reviews.text: Our eight year old got this for Christmas. It has held up well to her almost daily play. She loves it. Color is as pictured so far not a single complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute unicorn
customer_reviews.text: Gift for 5 year old. She absolutely loved it. It's very cute but it's alot smaller than I anticipated. Plan on buying her the new one when it is released.
customer_reviews.author: CISCO & SANDI

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my daughter. It held up pretty well and still works to this day. She was very excited when she received it.
customer_reviews.author: Meka VanDyke

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had been wanting for some time loves it except that it does not propel forward (walk) does more of a hoble and inches forward
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Cute presentation
customer_reviews.text: The horse dances and my granddaughter loves playing with the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: A great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, interactive, a favorite gift for our unicorn loving granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hollmann

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a birthday gift! Very well received and very cute! A toy that any little girl would love!
customer_reviews.author: Breliz

customer_reviews.title: Cute but kind of expensive
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but doesn't move as much as expected and it's a little expensive. We got one of the sea turtles that wall on land and swim and our daughter likes that one so much more
customer_reviews.author: MommaSaurous

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for our granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for our granddaughter. She fell in love with it at once. Loves the features and appearance and does wonders for her imagination. Great value as well.
customer_reviews.author: Captainhmk

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Gifting this as a Christmas gift. And it looks just like photo so adorable and good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: martha

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My little 4 year old has loved playing with this unicorn! It’s been 9 months and it’s still doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Planner Refill
customer_reviews.text: I compared very positively against the "At-A-Glance" package I tried for 2019.
customer_reviews.author: F Pare

customer_reviews.title: A cute Unicorn pet
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter really loves her pet Unicorn. It is a cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Max Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cute unicorn!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unicorn for my niece for Christmas and I am impressed for the price. It's super cute and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great Holiday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this gor my 8 yr old niece for Christmas. It looks so cute and has movement and sound that seems to be good quality. Great little girls gift for under $20!
customer_reviews.author: Candace P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: If your child likes unicorns, then they will love this little toy.
customer_reviews.author: LJM

customer_reviews.title: No packing
customer_reviews.text: Product was fine look exactly what it look like on the screen actually worked way it said it did only problem is product well ship with no packing material inside shipping box thank God it wasn't damaged I'm unloaded FedEx and UPS trucks and I know how they load and unload their stuff where I work at was very surprised how it was shipped
customer_reviews.author: Unloader

customer_reviews.title: Cute junk.
customer_reviews.text: Really junky. Cute enough, but the dance action wasn't worth the batteries or price it barely moves at all and often doesn't really respond.
customer_reviews.author: wiggly people

customer_reviews.title: A very fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this for her birthday! She plays with it regularly
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this little unicorn. I love that it's already to play with, batteries work!
customer_reviews.author: kelleysdiy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this toy, but after only a few weeks of play (just normal play) it doesn’t make the noises like it used to or move. Changed batteries without luck. Unfortunately I cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.B

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn
customer_reviews.text: Its cute but it doesnt walk really well. It just moves its feet and stays pretty much in the same place.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good present!
customer_reviews.text: Little small for what I thought but bang for buck can't go wrong. Good present.
customer_reviews.author: Scott F

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friends daughter who loves unicorns and she loved it. Very cute and colorful
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this! It was her favorite birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marie M.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this toy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this toy. She got it for her birthday in April and she carries around constantly. plays music but isnt overly annoying ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift worthy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deal for a great price. Works well. Good quality

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: So cute my daughter is going to love this. Great price as well

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for gift alot nicier then i expected!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: DAVID W VOUGHT SR

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do much
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would walk, but it only dances. My 4 yr old was bored with this almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing unicorn
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved it. It glows , walks and she can feed it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Music fails after a short time
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute toy, but after a few days of playing, there is no more music. I tried putting in new batteries, but alas, the unicorn now only dances and has the lights. It was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great young girl gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my grand-daughter! She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: KL Hudy

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Cute but did do much of anything. My granddaughter was board with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! 🤩
customer_reviews.text: The batteries didn't work so make sure to by batteries. My grand daughter is 7 and loves to play with it
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P

customer_reviews.title: Precious Unicorn!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it! Cute unicorn toy that plays music and dances.
customer_reviews.author: debra taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worth your buck
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Similar to other stores prices and it works just great. Can't wait for my niece to open this for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kid!
customer_reviews.text: Made my daughter very happy! Had a lot of features and does different things/shows different colors when you press different areas. My daughter is 6 and she picked up quickly on the actions. She went nuts when it started dancing! Very happy kiddo!
customer_reviews.author: Amberlyn Langmesser

customer_reviews.title: Broke quick
customer_reviews.text: Cute, daughter loved it but it broke within 6 hrs of opening it. The screw holding the front leg on snapped off ( inside the unicorn) We’ll see what some super glue can do.
customer_reviews.author: Maggiefar923

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved the gift. She got two so we kept this one at grandmas house 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My child loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My child loves it. I would think it would walk a bit more but apparently it dances instead.
customer_reviews.author: dixiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Darling toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unicorn toy for my 3 year old granddaughter and she just loves it. It’s made out of study plastic and the coloring on the unicorn is really cute. It has a pretty multicolored tail. The push button movement of the head and legs looks fairly realistic. I highly recommend this toy for your young unicorn loving kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Struck out twice with this toy.
customer_reviews.text: Returned first one because it had been opened and brush was missing. Replacement that was sent did not work even after I put in brand new batteries. I had a very disappointed 8 year old on Christmas Day. I would not but this toy or any toy sight unseen again, at least not for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Harsch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. It plays music but isn’t obnoxious!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Broken when arrived
customer_reviews.text: The toy legit didn’t work when we got it. Had some weird glitch where it just clicked and flashed. Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Kailyn Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift. What kid doesn't love Unicorns. Fast shipment.

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my unicorn lover daughter. It works and looks just as descibed

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Cutest little unicorn. It’s a winner for young girls. Well made, it dances.

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: My child likes to play with the unicorn and pretend feed it.

customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter she loves it very cute and well-made

customer_reviews.text: A little dirty and missing the brush. Besides that it is cute!

customer_reviews.text: She's so cute! Sound isn't overpowering , it's just right.

customer_reviews.title: 5 yr old loved this
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old granddaughter love this. Just the right size and the colors and 'dancing' are great

customer_reviews.title: 3yr old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old loves this toy. Even her 5 yr old sister enjoys playing with it. It moves and dances cutely. Good purchase

customer_reviews.text: I bought it for Christmas and I think my daughter will love it!

product_meta.title: Little Live Pets - Sparkles My Dancing Unicorn
product_meta.description:
Style:Sparkles

Sparkles, My Dancing Unicorn is the pet of your dreams! She is so full of magic, she shimmers, with a beautiful mane to brush and a rainbow light up horn that lights the way. This amazing unicorn reacts to your touch, she'll nuzzle up to you, trot on the spot or feed if you give her a magical cupcake. Sparkles loves to dance, watch her step in time to her very own music! Add some sparkle to your everyday with Sparkles, My Dancing Unicorn!

WARNING: Choking hazard - Small parts. Not for children under 3 years 
WARNING: Requires 2 x AAA/LR03 Batteries. Hazardous if swallowed - See instructions (Batteries not included).
feature_bullets: I am an interactive pet Unicorn and I dance to my own music!
My horn lights up and changes color!
Groom me with my brush and feed me my donut!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,205 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
